name: Super Necromancer 1.0
description:
In this #OccultClassic #Arcade game I made for PIGS' June Summer Slow Jam, you play as a noble and honourable necromancer trying to bring about the end of humanity by summoning forth a Great Old One!...

...okay maybe you're the bad guy.

Survive as long as you can against endless villagers! Complete the ritual to score points! Raise the dead to do your bidding! Compete against yourself and your friends for the high score!

P.S. This is my first game jam game I've ever made, so feedback would be awesome! And hey, if you like it maybe I'll keep working on it. :)

Controls
WASD/Arrows: Move
W/Up/Z: Jump
X: Attack
Hold C: Channel/Raise Dead
Esc: Quit

(You can also reset the high score on the title screen by pressing R).
